Questions/Notes: All Study IDs for which the sites have incicated they are activily recruiting will be flagged as 1.  Individuals with a token, but who are not being activly recruited are flagged as zero (default). All individuals who sign in without a valid token or pin are flagged as 2.
Personal Note: Confirm with Bhaumik that this still works with the new API, Review recruitment workflows to see if any change is needed.
